name: Games Plus Jam 'Time To Go Home'
name_original: Games Plus Jam 'Time To Go Home'
description:
Hey Guys,

I am 13 years old and this is only my second ever game(and first Game Jam). I have to submit early because i have School Camp all week. I wish i had more time to produce this game.My game is a platformer. You are an alien trying to get to his UFO to go back in time to get home. There may be some positioning issues with the final time as it is my first time using PlayerPrefs.

Have fun
